attributes.action: invade the Republic of Zimbabwe under the name of the UN or NATO to create a proper democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government acted in Iraq to remove a evil dicator who violated human rights laws and terrorised his own people. Now in a time of crisis inside Zimbabwe when alot of Zimbabweans are crying out to us as a nation to intervene and remove Mugabe from power the Prime Minister is only using words. Mugabe has been in power for 28 years and will not act when confronted by words. The governemnt owes the Zimbaweans a proper democracy after giving the Iraqi's one. This could be a debt repayed to the Zimbabweans after the Britsih colonisation.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=save+pub&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
